item.title: Mackerel Adobo
item.description: Quick and easy fish adobo dish of mackerel (typically galunggong). Delicious and good for your heart (mackerel is packed with omega-3 fatty acids). INGREDIENTS 1 kg mackerel (or galunggong) 1 matchbox size ginger 3-4 cloves garlic 1 teaspoon sugar 1⁄2 cup soy sauce 1⁄4 cup vinegar freshly ground black pepper to taste green chilis for garnish
